backend/main.mo: Empty actor definition with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of a banner image from HomePage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to their descriptions for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all main site pages using SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing nav, content outlet, and footer with dynamic year and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with active link styling and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining darker copper/bronze OKLCH theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlankPage.tsx: Intentionally empty page component returning null.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Renders the Divisions page with hero content and cards describing each Brotherhood division. Includes images and descriptions for Forge and Archive divisions plus others truncated.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays multi-section narrative history using cards and structured React content. Contains detailed lore about Texhoma, Colt Mercer, and discoveries beneath the city.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section and feature cards linking to ranks, divisions, lore, and history. Emphasizes the Brotherhood theme and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and a detailed card featuring the T-10 power armor and related accessory images. Focuses on visual presentation of artifacts.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Displays detailed rank hierarchy with cards describing leadership and other rank groups. Provides structured lists of responsibilities and traits for each rank.
frontend/src/pages/UniformArmorVariantsB: Shows armor and uniform variants per rank using structured cards. Lists specific equipment details for roles like High Conductor and Conductor.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking versions, existing features, and a pending request to remove the 'Brotherhood of Copper' banner.
